Audio formats supported by Archiver archives

High-quality images and audio files are often too large to send. With Archiver you can create archives that will reduce your image and music files so you can share them quickly and easily.

Audio formats supported by Archiver archives:

mp3wav
aifcaif
aiffau
sndm4a
